content: The Stained Jade Gourd is one of the Epic Gourds within Black Myth: Wukong. It has a different style of perk compared to the other Gourds in the game, built for those who enjoy fast-movement-based builds. Unfortunately, with only 7 uses, it can't be upgraded at the Shen Monkey Vendor.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Stained_Jade_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Stained Jade Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
The Stained Jade Gourd is one of the Epic Gourds within Black Myth: Wukong. It has a different style of perk compared to the other Gourds in the game, built for those who enjoy fast-movement-based builds. Unfortunately, with only 7 uses, it can't be upgraded at the Shen Monkey Vendor.
